sentences.english: The bootblack bought the black boot back.
sentences.chinese: 擦鞋童把黑色的長靴買回來。

sentences.english: The main trend for shoes are ankle boots and over-the-knee boots.
sentences.chinese: 最流行的當屬及踝短靴和過膝長靴。

sentences.english: Her flat black suede boots and cardigan help make this cooler weather appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 黑色平底的山羊皮長靴和羊毛衫讓秋涼望而卻步。

sentences.english: She wears an orange color dust coat with a pair of black boots.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件桔色的風衣，一雙黑亮的長靴。

sentences.english: I was younger then and, wearing steel toed boots.
sentences.chinese: 我那時很年輕，還穿着鐵頭長靴。

sentences.english: His boots and purple beret identify him as commanding the Scottish Paratroops.
sentences.chinese: 他的長靴和紫色貝雷帽表明他統領着蘇格蘭傘兵部隊。

sentences.english: My dad always wears his wader and fishing vest when he goes fishing.
sentences.chinese: 我爸去釣魚時都會穿他的防水長靴和釣魚背心。

sentences.english: He wore a celluloid collar and lace up boots.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿賽璐珞硬領，足登繫帶長靴。

sentences.english: Shrapnel-shredded calf burns through my boot.
sentences.chinese: 開花彈撕成碎片的小牛燃燒過我的長靴。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
